meanings.definition: Relating to the conversion of light into electricity.
meanings.sent1: The photovoltaic panels on the roof generate electricity from sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Solar calculators use photovoltaic technology to power themselves.
meanings.sent3: The photovoltaic garden lights were so efficient that they lit up the entire yard all night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a photovoltaic beam, brightening up the room instantly.
meanings.sent5: The photovoltaic cells hummed softly as they transformed sunlight into energy.

meanings.definition: A device that converts light into electricity.
meanings.sent1: The photovoltaic installed on the house's roof saved them money on electricity bills.
meanings.sent2: The photovoltaic in the park powered the lights that illuminated the pathways.
meanings.sent3: The photovoltaic in the flashlight never needed batteries, making it very convenient.
meanings.sent4: The photovoltaic in the streetlamp worked tirelessly, lighting up the road every night.
meanings.sent5: The photovoltaic on the spacecraft provided energy for the entire mission.
